id: {Player} stands his ground as {Monster1} emerges from the mist

onSuccess.displayText:
The mist thickened as {Monster1} rose from the dark water. Its form was vast, scales glistening like wet obsidian, eyes burning with a cold intelligence. {Player} felt fear grip his heart, but something within him refused to yield. He pulled out his weapon and chant magic.

The creature paused, watching him with a strange recognition. Then a voice, deep and resonant, filled the air. *So the lost child still lives.* The sound made the water tremble.

Memories not his own flashed before his eyes. He saw a battle beneath a falling sky, angels and beasts clashing in a storm of fire. Among them was a woman of radiant light, holding a newborn child â€” the same amulet that now hung around his neck glimmered in her hands.

The creature lowered its massive head until it was level with {Player}. *You are not my enemy,* it rumbled. *You are the last echo of a world that ended with the stars. You were hidden among mortals so you might one day decide what remains of that light.*

Silence returned to the lakeshore, broken only by the gentle lapping of the waves. {Monster1} sank slowly back into the water, leaving {Player} alone once more beneath the starlit sky.

He knew the truth now. His life, his past, even the kindness of {Queen#Name}, were pieces of a greater mystery that had finally revealed itself. But whether to carry that truth or leave it behind was a choice only he could make.
choices: {Player} accepts the truth of his celestial origin and sets forth to embrace his destiny
{Player} buries the truth and returns to {Kingdom#Name} to live as a prince once more
